1.content:
Weiss Schnee yawned as she began to wake up. Last night had been one of the most restful sleeps she had had in a long time. As Weiss stretched her arm brushed her pony tail. Wait her pony tail?! The former heiress was sure she had let her hair down when she went to bed. Now wide awake Weiss looked down at herself just make sure there was nothing else unusual about her appearance. Sure enough Weiss was still in her nightgown and barefeet. Weiss breathed a slight sigh of relieve, before looking at her surroundings. That was when she felt her heart sink. Weiss was no longer where she went to bed last night.

Before we get into where she was now, let's first decide if Weiss starts this adventure normal sized or she going to be an inch tall.
1.title: Waking Up

11.content: Now that we've established Weiss will at least start this adventure out at her normal size, where is she?
11.title: Normal Sized

111.content:
As Weiss looked around her surroundings she noticed she was in her, in her dorm, at Beacon Academy.

         "Wait, Beacon got overrun with Grimm almost a year ago," Weiss practically whispered to herself. She could be in serious trouble. With a 'gulp' Weiss carefully got out of bed, making sure to avoid hitting her head on the top bunk, and got to her feet. Weiss cold feel how cold the hard wood floor was beneath her barefeet as she slowly made her way to the window. Once there the former heiress positioned herself so that she would be able to see out the window, but the chances of anything seeing her would be minimized. What she saw made Weiss gasp.

         Outside was an infestation of Grimm. On the ground Weiss had been able to see Beowolves, Creeps, Goliaths, and more. She could swear she even caught a glimpse of a King Taijitu. In the air the former heiress had seen an assortment of flying Grimm ranging from Griffons and Nevermores.

         Weiss backed away from the window as she tried to calm herself down. This was a horrible situation to be in. Weiss needed to get out of here before she became Grimm chow. 'But how,' Weiss pondered. She didn't have her weapon or any dust so her ability to use her semblance would be limited. Weiss might've been able to sneak out, but should she go left down the hall or right? Alternatively, Weiss could stay where she is and wait to see if anyone else shows up. What did Weiss end up doing?
111.title: A Grimm Situation

choices: Weiss opens the exit door and runs out
Weiss slowly opens the door and glances out
Weiss backs away from the door and considers going back
1111.content: Weiss quickly darted down the right hand hallway. Passing dozens upon dozens of destroyed dorms, the young Heiress made her way across the campus. She flinched as she heard some vicious roar behind her, causing her to move little faster. She eventually paused at the exit doors to the building...
1111.title: Go Right Down The Hall

1113.content:
Weiss decided that staying where she was would be smarter than wandering around in a Grimm invested school. Not even a minute after she decided this, the door to her dorm burst apart. Weiss couldn't help but cry out as the gorilla like Grimm, known as Beringel, rushed in and stopped in front of her. The Beringel looked at Weiss, who was too petrified by fear and shock to move, for only a moment before it grabbed with its hands, pinning her arms to her side.

         Weiss snapped out of her paralysis and began squirming in order to try and escape, but the Beringel's grip on her was too strong. Without ceremony the gorilla like Grimm began lifting Weiss up into the air. With her feet no longer on the ground the former heiress began kicking her legs in the air in an attempt to possibly hit the creature, but to no success. The Beringel lifted Weiss up until her head was level with its mouth, and then it opened its maw wide.

         "NO!" Weiss cried out as the Beringel shoved her head into its mouth. Thanks to her aura Weiss was not decapitated when the Grimm's toothy maw wrapped around her head, though it still hurt having those pointy teeth poking into her neck. The feeling of being eaten overwhelmed Weiss though and she began kicking her dangling legs harder for all the good it did her. Then with a 'GULP' the Beringel shoved Weiss's shoulders and breasts into its mouth as her head entered its throat. The beast moved its grip down to the former heiress's rear to reduce any chance of her escaping. With another 'GULP' the Beringel shoved Weiss up to her rear in its maw, thus leaving only her kicking legs dangling outside its maw.

         Sensing that the huntress was now helpless the Beringel released the grip it held on her with its hands. Then tilting its head upwards the Grimm took another 'GULP' and swallowed Weiss up to her knees. The former heiress's kicking became more restricted now. With another 'GULP' the Beringel's toothy maw sealed around the former heiress's ankles. Now that her barefeet were all that remained of her outside the Beringel's maw all Weiss could do to struggle was wiggle her feet and toes. Then with one final 'GULP' the Beringel's maw sealed around Weiss's wiggling feet and toes before they too slid down its gullet. The Beringal brought its head back to level and patted its belly as it felt Weiss fully slid into it. It could feel her wriggling inside as she desperately struggle to escape, but paid its wriggling gut no mind. With a 'BURP' the Beringel left to do something else while it slowly digested Weiss Schnee.
1113.title: Schnee Brand Beringel Chow

112.content:
"Well I suppose there are worst places to be stranded," Weiss commented as she noticed the ocean to her left, and the jungle to her right.

         The island Weiss found herself on seemed peaceful, and she might have taken time to enjoy it if she wasn't dressed in her pajamas without her weapon or any dust to protect herself. No, the former heiress couldn't treat this like some kind of vacation. As Weiss quickly got back up onto her feet, while brushing the sand off her night gown and bare legs, and quickly ran through her options.Weiss would eventually need to find sustenance and shelter which meant have to venture into the unknown jungle. However, she would also need to get off the island which meant Weiss would have to either build a signal of some kind or a raft. Both she could do by sticking to the edge of the jungle. Alternatively she could just stay where she was. What did Weiss decide to do first?
112.title: Weiss's Island

choices: None of them, A series of tremors interrupts her
1121.content:
"Food and shelter need to be my priorities," Weiss said to herself. "And my best bet for both will be in the jungle."

         With that the former heiress trudged into the jungle. The jungle was hot and humid. The sunlight barely broke through the canopy of leaves, making navigation through the dense foliage somewhat harder for Weiss. Lush vegetation slapped into Weiss as she moved deeper into the jungle. Her aura prevented her from taking any damage from the vegetation, though she could still feel the pain. Something Weiss was reminded very much of when she accidentally stepped on sharp rock causing her to cry out.

         As Weiss wiped some sweat from her brow she suddenly stopped as she saw something that might help her. Before the former heiress were three paths. The path on the left was covered in vines and other dense vegetation. That meant Weiss could potentially find food and water down that path, but something about the vines gave her the creeps. The path straight ahead was clear as though it experienced frequent traffic and seemed to head towards the island's mountain. The would be less resistance for Weiss to move through and the mountain might have caves she could use as shelter. However, it looked like a game trail, and predators that would be more than happy to eat Weiss might be hunting on it. Finally the path on the right looked like it was somewhat paved by stone suggesting it was man made. Going down that path might mean food, shelter, and help for Weiss. However it looked as though that path hadn't been maintained in a while. Weiss pondered for a moment on which path to take before heading down...
1121.title: Into The Jungle

choices: Brushed Up Against a Group of Vines
Fell into a Body of Water
11211.content:
Weiss considered going down the stone path when the wind blew from the vine covered path and she caught a whiff of an alluring aroma. The scent made Weiss's mouth water, and a sudden grumble from her stomach made her aware of just how hungry she was. Whatever the source of that scent was had to be edible. While the vines didn't sit right with Weiss, she decided she had to find the source of that alluring aroma. So with little hesitation Weiss began her trek down the path covered in vines.

         Travel down the path was slow going as Weiss made every possible effort to avoid making contact with the vines. The fact that there was even less sunlight on this path made them all the more unsettling. Avoiding the vines wasn't easy for the former heiress since they were everywhere. Often Weiss would have to squeeze her slender form past groups of them just to avoid brushing up against them, and more then once she would start having to walk on her tip toes to avoid stepping on the vines. Weiss was sure though that once she found the source of the alluring aroma the effort would all be worth it.

         Said aroma only grew more entrancing the closer the former heiress got to it. Slowly but surely as the scent grew stronger Weiss began to get more careless with her movements. Wanting to get to the source soon Weiss began to ignore her surroundings until she...
11211.title: Vines All Around

choices: Try to tear the vine off her ankles
112111.content:
Weiss had become so enthralled by the alluring aroma that she was no longer watching where she stepped. With her next step her barefoot made contact with a vine, and said vine quickly came to life. Faster than Weiss could react the vine wrapped itself around her ankles, stopping her dead in her tracks.

         "What the?!" Weiss cried out as she suddenly became aware of the vine wrapped around her ankles. Before she could try and remove it, vine gave a short but powerful tug that forced Weiss to fall forward. The former heiress let out an 'Oof' as landed hard on her face. As Weiss lifted her head back up the vine began to drag her further into the underbrush. Weiss screamed in terror as she dragged against her will to some unknown destination. Where ever the vine was taking her Weiss was certain she didn't want to end up there. But what could the former heiress do?
112111.title: Vine Attack

choices: Used a Rock to Cut the Vine
Tried to Rip the Vine off with Her Bare Hands
1121111.content:
As Weiss was being dragged away by the vine she desperately scrabbled for anything she could grab onto in order to stop her progress. It seemed futile until her right hand managed to grasp an above ground tree root. Weiss practically cheered as she grasped it with her other hand as well. However, her ordeal was not over yet as the former heiress found herself become slightly suspended in the air as the vine continued to pull on her.

         Curious as to where it was the vine so desperately wanted to take her, Weiss chanced a look behind her to see if she could find out and cried out in shock. The vine that was wrapped around her ankles,as well as several others, was attached to a huge venus flytrap. Just one look was enough for Weiss to she that it was big enough to fit her in its jaws, and it was still trying to make her its next meal.

         As the flytrap's vine continued to pull on her, Weiss felt like she might be ripped in half as she grunted from the effort to stay put. She would not be able to hold onto the tree root forever. Already, Weiss could feel her grip starting to loosen while the plant's grip on her ankles remained as tight as ever. If Weiss didn't do something soon she was going to become plant food! Suddenly she...
1121111.title: Holding on Tight

11211111.content:
"NO!" Weiss screamed as her grip finally gave out and another vine wrapped around her wrists. With her wrists and ankles bound Weiss soon found herself suspended in the air in a horizontal position. While she faced the ground a simple turn of her head was the former heiress needed to bring the huge venus flytrap back into her few. Weiss was perfectly aligned with its maw now! Then she began moving towards the huge carnivorous plant again.

         Weiss screamed and began squirming in the plant's in order to escape, but it was useless. She was plant food now. Weiss watched in horror as the ground below her was replaced by the plant's lower lobe.The vines that held Weiss gently lowered her onto the interior of the lower, and held her squirming form there. Then the plant's maw began to close around her.

         "This can't be happening," Weiss moaned as she saw daylight slowly disappearing around her. Just before the plant completely sealed Weiss inside its maw, the vines that held her unwrapped themselves from her wrists and ankles before sliding out of the maw. Then Weiss was sealed in darkness. Now that she was no longer bound by vines Weiss began her struggle inside the plant in earnest. The former heiress kicked and punched as as best as she could in the lying position she was forced to remain in as she cried out for help. Unfortunately, Weiss's struggles were barely noticeable as tiny lumps that appeared in the lobes of the flytrap and her screams were heard as no more than a muffle.

         Then the worst part began. The inside of the venus flytrap's maw began to ooze digestive enzymes. Weiss slowly became covered from head to toe in the digestive enzymes. She could feel her whole body began to tingle as the enzymes began the process of digesting her. Weiss's aura protected her from the worst of being digested, but she knew that wouldn't last. The former heiress began struggling harder and screaming louder, but it was ultimately pointless. After about five minutes Weiss ceased her struggling and her voice was sore from screaming. All she had managed to do was tire herself out. Weiss drifted off to sleep just before her aura gave out and her true digestion began.

         The venus flytrap slowly digested Weiss Schnee over the course of three days until she was nothing more than a nutritious soup. Then the plant spent the next two days absorbing said soup. On the sixth day the maw of the venus flytrap reopened to await its next meal.
11211111.title: Devoured by a Huge Carnivorous Plant

choices: Another predator wanted her as its meal
11211114.content: How was Weiss freed from the vine?
11211114.title: Was freed from the vine

choices: The Vines Start Lifting Her Up
The Vines Start Lowering Her Down
The Vines Began To Squeeze Her
A Predator Is Attracted to Her Struggles
112112.content:
Weiss was so intoxicated by the alluring aroma that she became careless enough to allow her right arm to brush up against a group of vines. No sooner had the form heiress made contact with the vines did they spring to life.

         "What the?!" Weiss cried out as the vines moved around her with blazing speed.

         The next thing Weiss knew she was suspended in the air by the vegetation. So completely did the vines have her wrapped up, that the only parts of Weiss that were still exposed were her head and her bare feet. Recognizing the situation she found herself in the former heiress squirmed in vines' grip.

         "This can't be happening," Weiss grunted as she squirmed. Unfortunately the vines had too strong a grip on her. Then...
112112.title: All Wrapped Up

choices: Yes, Weiss makes it there safely
Nope Weiss has to deal with a predator
11212.content: Something about the vines didn't feel right to Weiss, and the fact that the stone path wasn't well maintained did not seem like a good sign. So with that Weiss decided to risk the potential game trail and go to the mountain. However was Weiss able to make it to her destination safely?
11212.title: Journey Down the Clear Path

112122.content: What kind of predator does she encounter?
112122.title: Nope Weiss has to deal with a predator

choices: Stood There and Allowed Herself to be Eaten
1121222.content:
Weiss walked down the clear path for hours as she made her way to the mountain. Soon the sun was high over her head and the heat was starting to get to the former heiress as she trudged on. Weiss panted heavily as she wiped sweat from her forehead. Then she saw it. A log that had seemingly fallen in the middle of the path. Weiss could easily climb over it as it only came up to her waist, but she could also use it to sit and rest for a bit.

         "It couldn't hurt to rest for a bit," Weiss mumbled to herself as she walked over to the log.

         Upon reaching the log the sweaty huntress sat down upon it to rest. Weiss had only enough time to catch her breathe when suddenly the log seemed to move and throw her off.

         "What was that?" Weiss said as she stood up brushing herself off. Then there was a shockingly loud hiss from behind. Wide eyed Weiss turned around and became frozen in fear. The log hadn't been a log at all. It was a massive snake that was more than large enough to make a meal out of Weiss. Even worse it was staring right at her with hunger in its eyes. The snake let out another hiss and rushed at the former heiress. Weiss...
1121222.title: Weiss and the Serpent

1124.content:
"I'm not moving one inch," Weiss declared and stomped her foot in the sand. As soon as she did that, the ground beneath her barefeet began to shake.

         "What's happening?!," Weiss cried out as she tried to maintain her balance. The former heiress stuck her arms out and waved them wildly as the ground continued to shake. Then Weiss gasped as she was lifted up into the air by a rising mound of sand. She nearly fell off the mound twice, but somehow she managed to stay on her feet. When the mound finally stopped rising, and the last grains of sand fell from it, Weiss looked down to see what she was standing on, and let out a horrified scream.

         Weiss was not standing on a mound, but a giant worm of some kind. The worst part was that she was standing directly on its lips. Before Weiss could even think of jumping off those very same lips began splitting apart as the worm opened its hungry maw in order to consume the unlucky girl on its head.

         "No, no, no, no," Weiss cried as she was forced to do a split order keep from falling into her hungry predator's maw. Weiss had to wave her arms about just to maintain her increasingly precarious balance. As the worm's jaws continued to widen Weiss felt as though she would be torn in half. Then the jaws reached their limit, and the former heiress let out a slight sigh of relief. However, Weiss's situation was far from improved as she was practically hanging onto each lip by her toes. A quick glance down provided the huntress with a view of a slimy maw filled with tiny teeth, a rope like tongue, and a dark abyss she would find herself travelling down if she didn't do something. Weiss looked back up and started looking around for anything to help her escape, when she suddenly felt a slimy sensation on the sole of her right foot. Another glance down caused Weiss to grimace as she saw the rope like tongue licking her foot.

         "Eeww," Weiss moaned as the tongue then began to lick her other foot. Then the former heiress noticed that she was starting to slide. The worm's saliva was causing her to lose the fragile grip she had with her feet. Weiss could only watch wide eyed as she slid millimeter by millimeter until finally she lost her grip altogether.

         "NO!" Weiss screamed as she fell into the worm's hungry maw. Desperate to save herself, Weiss quickly and reflexively wrapped her arms and legs around the rope like tongue before she could plummet into the predator's throat. Turning her head up Weiss looked out at the sky for one final time before the worm's jaws snapped shut, sealing her inside. For about five minutes the worm shook its head about in an attempt to shake its meal free of its tongue. Then without ceremony the worm made an audible 'GULP', and a slight bulge that used to be Weiss Schnee could be seen traveling down its underside just before the creature returned underground.

         Weiss grimaced once again as she found herself travelling feet first down a slimy, confining tube. All around her, Weiss could feel the muscles of the esophagus massaging every inch of her slender form down to her doom. A mixture of saliva and mucus clung to the former heiress from head to toe. Below her feet Weiss could hear the gurgles of the belly growing closer and closer.

         "This is a nightmare," Weiss moaned as her feet came into contact with the stomach sphincter. Recognizing the young woman as food, it quickly squeezed her into the waiting belly. Weiss now found herself in a fleshy chamber that was roomier than the esophagus, but not by much. Weiss quickly found that she could only get up on her hands and knees as she observed her fleshy tomb. Before Weiss could act further the walls, floor, and ceiling began undulating, kneading every inch of the poor girl. Then the digestive juices began to ooze out and cover the former heiress from head to toe. As Weiss lay there marinating in digestive enzymes and being kneaded by the stomach, she couldn't help but be thankful that her aura was protecting her from being digested for now. Though Weiss could still feel the digestive juices causing her skin to tingle. After about ten minutes the lack of air began to get to Weiss, and she passed out into a sleep she would never awaken from just before her aura gave out and her true digestion began.
1124.title: Weiss and the Worm's Gullet

12.content: Now that we've established that Weiss shall be 1 inch tall, where does our bite sized huntress find herself?
12.title: Bite Sized

123.content:
At first Weiss couldn't help but blink in confusion. She seemed to be in some kind of forest surrounded by flat, green trees. 'But trees don't grow like that' Weiss thought to herself. Then her eyes widened as the realization hit her.

         "Those are blades of grass," Weiss gasped in shock and awe. "I've shrunk!"

         Indeed Weiss had been shrunk. The how and why she did not know, but that wasn't her biggest concern. Looking at her surroundings Weiss determined that she was about an inch in height at most. Practically bite sized. Weiss needed to find help before she got crushed or worst eaten. To do that though she needed to get a better view of her surroundings first. Thankfully Weiss noticed a rock, now the size of a boulder to her, a feet from that she could use to get a better vantage point.

         Scrambling atop the rock the first thing Weiss noticed was the scent of live stock in the air, and took only one glance for her to realize why. The former heiress saw from atop her perch that not only had she been shrunken, but that she had been transported to a farm as well. In the distance Weiss could see a farm house and various pens for the animals. Closer to her position was a pond that the animals no doubt drank from when out in the field.

         After gathering as much information as she could Weiss scurried off her rock in order to ponder what her next course of action should be. The farm house might be her best bet to find someone to help her. However, since she was on farm the farmers might be tending to the animals already. Then there was the pond. It might be a good idea for the tiny huntress to use it to freshen up a bit before she went find help. Weiss pondered her options for a moment, before she finally decided to go to the...
123.title: Big Farm, Tiny Princess

1231.content:
"If I go to the pond I'll probably get eaten," Weiss reasoned to herself. "And if I go to the animal pens I'll probably get crushed, eaten, or both."

         With that Weiss decided to try her luck with the farm house. After all it seemed like her best chance to get help assuming something didn't eat her along the way, or she didn't get crushed underfoot or something once there. There was always that possibility though. Weiss shook those thoughts from her mind though and proceed to make her to the farm house despite how difficult the grass was to move through at her current size. However, would Miss. Schnee's journey to the farm house be eventful or uneventful?
1231.title: Weiss's Journey Begins

info.brief_description: Weiss Schnee from RWBY wakes up one day to find herself at the bottom of the food chain.
info.description:
When Weiss Schnee, from RWBY, wakes up one morning she finds that she in no longer in the same place as last night. What's worst is that Weiss also finds herself surrounded by various predators that wouldn't mind gobbling up a former heiress. Unarmed Weiss must no try find help or way back to her friends before she ends traveling down a gullet.

Weiss as she appears in the story: https://66.media.tumblr.com/62ae0aa61171e9d3c4956f59cd1e3abb/tumblr_pgyyr5U0KG1v...

Rules:
1.) SOFT VORE ONLY!
2.) Weiss ISN'T immune to digestion, once she is eaten she's done for.
3.) Full tour digestion is allowed.
4.) All story lines must end with Weiss being eaten and digested.
5.) If Weiss starts off a story line shrunk she cannot grow or shrink any more.
6.) If Weiss is shrunk most people must remain unaware of her, and if they do notice her they think she is a bug or be willing to treat her as food.
7.) Cannon and original types of Grimm are allowed to be predators.
8.) This story takes place after Volume 3
9.) Be descriptive.
10.) HAVE FUN! =)
info.pretty_title: Weiss Schnee vs. The Hungry Everything
